name: Adaptive Biasing Force
short_description: This is an implementation of the adaptive biasing force method (ABF) in NAMD. The code for ABF was developed by Eric Darve, Stanford University. ABF is a method created by E. Darve and A. Pohorille to calculate the free energy of bio-molecules.
